entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
